abstract: New York Jets players and officials voice support for rookie Jeremy Kerley, who supplants traded Derrick Mason as the team’s No 3 receiver.
snippet: Jets players and officials Thursday closed ranks around the rookie Jeremy Kerley, who supplants the traded Derrick Mason as the team’s No. 3 receiver.
lead_paragraph: Jets players and officials Thursday closed ranks around the rookie Jeremy Kerley, who supplants the traded Derrick Mason as the team’s No. 3 receiver.

headline.main: Rookie’s Crash Course in Life in the N.F.L.
headline.print_headline: Rookie’s Crash Course In Life in the N.F.L.
headline.seo: Kerley, Jets’ Rookie, Gets a Crash Course in Life in the N.F.L.
